version_description:
Hello Captains! In this update we've adressed the following:
- Bugfix: Refined materials/ assembly prices does not increase when moving to new planet
- Lowered required ingredients for some recipes
- Lowered requirements for some missions
- Bugfix: Players could get stuck in initial tutorial if exiting before finishing it
- Bugfix: Sometimes mines would stop
- Bugfix: Refinery stopped working sometimes
- Bugfix: Recipe screens now "remember" its position
- Bugfix: Disabled free relics/free cash ads in tutorial
- Bugfix: Special Offer appeared on startup blocking players
- Bugfix: Circle around deposits went out of sync
- Bugfix: Wrong rate-link

We wish you the best of luck, Captain!
- ExoMiner ground control

Hey Captain! 

Based on your feedback we've:
- Simplified the refining/constructing UI (all can be accessed in the same building)
- Added some buildings to make
- Polished resource UI to allow you to see planet at the same time
- Polished resource deposit UI
- Re-balanced the game by removing unpopular refined ore and items- Added language support
Thank you for your continued support! We hope you are doing well Captain!
- ExoMiner team
